description:
'''Black Leather Jesus''' is a [[harsh noise wall]] group originally from [[Houston, Texas]]. The group was founded by [[Richard Ramirez (musician)|Richard Ramirez]] in 1989, who fronts the band alongside partner Sean E. Matzus and various other musicians assisting. At one point, the band had 14 members. The group's themes focus on [[Sadomasochism|S&M]] and the [[Leather subculture|gay leather subculture]]. It was inspired by the [[kidnapping of Colleen Stan]].

Black Leather Jesus opened for [[Sonic Youth]] in [[Marfa, Texas]] in 2007. Black Leather Jesus has done releases with [[Merzbow]], [[Incapacitants]], Blue Sabbath Black Cheer, [[The Haters]] and M.S.B.R. among several others. The band is presently based near [[Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania]].
